ej.bluetooth

Class BluetoothAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • ej.bluetooth.BluetoothAttribute
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BluetoothCharacteristic, BluetoothDescriptor

    public abstract class BluetoothAttribute
extends java.lang.Object
    The BluetoothAttribute class represents a remote or a local GATT attribute. An attribute is either a characteristic or a descriptor.

    This class provides methods to get the UUID of the attribute and to get the service to which the attribute belongs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BluetoothService getService()
      Returns the service to which this attribute belongs.
      BluetoothUuid getUuid()
      Returns the UUID of this attribute.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getUuid

        public BluetoothUuid getUuid()
        Returns the UUID of this attribute.
        Returns:
        the UUID of this attribute.

      • getService

        @Nullable
public BluetoothService getService()
        Returns the service to which this attribute belongs.

        This method returns null if this is a local attribute and it has not been added to a service.

        Returns:
        the service to which this attribute belongs.
